Entries.Saloon: I come here on Fridays, because it's probably the most exciting thing in this town.$s
Entries.Saloon2: The city used to have dozens of places like this.$u
Entries.Saloon6: I love that almost everyone in town is here on Friday.  It's a lot of fun!$h
Entries.Saloon8: I'm starting to think that you might come on Friday's to see somewhere here...$l
Entries.Saloon10: I hope I'll be dancing here with my partner like Demetrius and Robin someday...$l
